definition.text: It is a type of bot that can fetch data from any API on the internet as long as it is provided with a API Map at runtime.

paragraphs.text: An API Data Fetcher Bots is similar to a Sensor Bot, except that the second need dev users to code an algo for extracting the data, while the first one can do it without coding, just using an API Map.
Superalgos->Topic->Data Mining - Fetching Data From APIs->Main Workflow
